00491 //----------------------------------------------------------
00492 static
00493 void
00494 SplitString( const std::string& str, std::vector< std::string >& vec)
00495 {
00496         std::string::size_type start= str.find_first_not_of( " " );
00497         while ( start != std::string::npos ) 
00498         {
00499                 std::string::size_type end = str.find( ' ', start );
00500                 vec.push_back( str.substr( start, end - start ) );
00501                 start = str.find_first_not_of( " ", end );
00502         }
00503 }
00504 
00505 
00506 //----------------------------------------------------------
00507 static
00508 void
00509 CheckExts( const char *neededExtsParam )
00510 {
00511         B_ASSERT( glExtString != 0 );
00512         B_ASSERT( wglExtString != 0 );
00513 
00514         vector< string > needed;
00515         SplitString( neededExtsParam, needed);
00516         vector< string > exts;
00517         SplitString( glExtString, exts );
00518         SplitString( wglExtString, exts );
00519         std::sort( needed.begin(), needed.end() );
00520         std::sort( exts.begin(), exts.end() );
00521         
00522         vector< string > notFound;
00523         std::set_difference( needed.begin(), needed.end(), 
00524                 exts.begin(), exts.end(), 
00525                 std::back_insert_iterator< vector< string > >( notFound ) );
00526 
00527 //      //! make a writable string.
00528 //      unsigned int memSize = ( unsigned int )strlen( neededExtsParam ) + 1;
00529 //      char *neededExts = new char[ memSize + 1 ];
00530 //      MemCopy( neededExts, neededExtsParam, memSize );
00531 //
00532 //      //! scan for extensions.
00533 //      vector< char * > notFound;
00534 //      char* context = 0;
00535 //      for ( char *token = strtok_s( neededExts, " \0", &context ); token != 0; token = strtok_s( NULL, " \0", &context ) )
00536 //      {
00537 //              if ( strstr( glExtString, token ) == 0 && strstr( wglExtString, token ) == 0 )
00538 //              {
00539 //                      notFound.push_back( token );
00540 //              }
00541 //      }
00542 //
00544         if ( notFound.size() != 0 )
00545         {
00546                 tstring errStr = "Video card does not meet minimum requirements.  The following extensions were not found...\n";
00547                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < notFound.size(); ++i )
00548                 {
00549                         errStr += "\t";
00550                         errStr += notFound[ i ];
00551                         errStr += "\n";
00552                 }
00553 
00554                 //delete[] neededExts;
00555                 B_ERROR( errStr );
00556         }
00557 //      delete[] neededExts;
00558 }
00559 
00560 //----------------------------------------------------------
00561 unsigned int
00562 GetExtCount( const char* glExtString )
00563 {
00564         unsigned int count = 1;
00565         const char* cur = strchr( glExtString, ' ' );
00566         while ( cur )
00567         {
00568                 cur = strchr( cur + 1, ' ' );
00569                 ++count;
00570         }
00571         return count;
00572 }
00573 
00574 //----------------------------------------------------------
00575 char*
00576 BuildDriverInfoString( const char* glRendererString, const char* glVendorString, const char* glVersionString, const char* glExtString, const char* wglExtString )
00577 {
00579         size_t glRendererLen = strlen( glRendererString );
00580         size_t glVendorLen = strlen( glVendorString );
00581         size_t glVersionLen = strlen( glVersionString );
00582         size_t glExtLen = strlen( glExtString );
00583         size_t wglExtLen = strlen( wglExtString );
00584 
00586         unsigned int glExtCount = GetExtCount( glExtString );
00587         unsigned int wglExtCount = GetExtCount( wglExtString );
00588 
00590         size_t totalGLStrLen = glRendererLen + glExtLen + wglExtLen;
00591 
00593         size_t localLen = strlen( "OpenGL Version: \n" ) + strlen( "Vendor: " ) + strlen( "Renderer: \n" ) + 
00594                 strlen( "WGL Extensions:\n" ) + strlen( "Extensions:\n" );
00595         localLen += 2 * glExtCount;             
00596         localLen += 2 * wglExtCount;    
00597 
00599         char* driverString = ( char* )malloc( localLen + totalGLStrLen + 1);
00600 
00602         char* dst = driverString;
00603         dst += sprintf( dst, "Vendor: %s\n", glVendorString );
00604         dst += sprintf( dst, "Renderer: %s\n", glRendererString );
00605         dst += sprintf( dst, "OpenGL Version: %s\n", glVersionString );
00606 
00608         dst += sprintf( dst, "WGL Extensions: \n" );
00609 
00611         char* temp = strcpy( ( char* )malloc( wglExtLen + 1 ), wglExtString );
00612         for ( char* ext = strtok( temp, " " ); ext != 0; ext = strtok( 0, " " ) )
00613                 dst += sprintf( dst, "\t%s\n", ext );
00614         free( temp );
00615 
00617         dst += sprintf( dst, "GL Extensions: \n" );
00618         
00620         temp = strcpy( ( char* )malloc( glExtLen + 1 ), glExtString );
00621         for ( char* ext = strtok( temp, " " ); ext != 0; ext = strtok( 0, " " ) )
00622                 dst += sprintf( dst, "\t%s\n", ext );
00623         free( temp );
00624 
00626         return driverString;
00627 }
00628 
00629 //----------------------------------------------------------
00630 void
00631 StartGL( HDC device )
00632 {
00634         const char *version = ( const char * )glGetString( GL_VERSION );
00635         string ver = version;
00636         size_t midPt = ver.find_first_of( "." );
00637         int majorVer = atoi( ver.substr( 0, midPt ).c_str() );
00638         int minorVer = atoi( ver.substr( midPt+1, midPt+2 ).c_str() );
00639         while ( minorVer > 10 ) minorVer /= 10;
00640 
00642         if ( majorVer < 2 )
00643         {
00644                 B_ERROR( "Video card does not meet minimum requirements (OpenGL 2.0 is required)!" );
00645         }
00646 
00647         if ( majorVer == 2 )
00648         {
00649                 if ( minorVer == 0 )
00650                         profile = EGLP_2_0;
00651                 else if ( minorVer >= 1 )
00652                         profile = EGLP_2_1;
00653         }
00654         else if ( majorVer >= 3 )
00655         {
00656                 profile = EGLP_3_0;
00657         }
00658 
00660         _deviceGammaSupported = GetDeviceGammaRamp( device, _deviceGammaTable ) != 0;
00661 
00663         wglGetExtensionsStringARB =             ( PFNWGLGETEXTENSIONSSTRINGARBPROC       )wglGetProcAddress( "wglGetExtensionsStringARB" );
00664         wglSwapIntervalEXT =                    ( PFNWGLSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC )wglGetProcAddress( "wglSwapIntervalEXT" );
00665         wglGetSwapIntervalEXT =                 ( PFNWGLGETSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC )wglGetProcAddress( "wglGetSwapIntervalEXT" );
00666 
00667         bwglSwapIntervalEXT( 0 );
00668 
00670         glExtString = ( const char * )glGetString( GL_EXTENSIONS );
00671 	::wglExtString = bwglGetExtensionsStringARB( device );
00672 
00674         CheckExts( "GL_ARB_shader_objects "
00675                            "GL_ARB_vertex_shader "
00676                            "GL_ARB_fragment_shader "
00677                            "GL_ARB_transpose_matrix "
00678                            "GL_EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic "
00679 //                         "GL_EXT_texture_mirror_clamp "
00680                            "GL_EXT_texture_lod_bias "
00681                            "GL_EXT_framebuffer_object "
00682                            "WGL_ARB_pixel_format "
00683                            "WGL_ARB_pbuffer "
00684                            "WGL_ARB_render_texture "
00685                            "WGL_ATI_pixel_format_float "
00686                           );
00687 
00689         ARB_texture_rectangle = ( strstr( glExtString, "GL_ARB_texture_rectangle" ) != 0 );
00690         ARB_texture_non_power_of_two = ( strstr( glExtString, "GL_ARB_texture_non_power_of_two" ) != 0 );
00691 
00693         glShaderString = ( const char* )glGetString( GL_SHADING_LANGUAGE_VERSION_ARB );
00694         glRendererString = ( const char* )glGetString( GL_RENDERER );
00695         glVendorString = ( const char* )glGetString( GL_VENDOR );
00696         glVersionString = ( const char* )glGetString( GL_VERSION );
00697 
00699         glFormattedDriverString = BuildDriverInfoString( glRendererString, glVendorString, glVersionString, glExtString, wglExtString );
00700 
00702         PrintF( glFormattedDriverString );
00703 
00704         //---------------------------------------------------------
00706         //---------------------------------------------------------
00709         glBlendColor =                                  ( PFNGLBLENDCOLORPROC                            )wglGetProcAddress( "glBlendColor" );
00710         glBlendEquation =                               ( PFNGLBLENDEQUATIONPROC                         )wglGetProcAddress( "glBlendEquation" );
00711         glDrawRangeElements =                   ( PFNGLDRAWRANGEELEMENTSPROC             )wglGetProcAddress( "glDrawRangeElements" );
00712         glColorTable =                                  ( PFNGLCOLORTABLEPROC                            )wglGetProcAddress( "glColorTable" );
00713         glColorTableParameterfv =               ( PFNGLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFVPROC         )wglGetProcAddress( "glColorTableParameterfv" );
00714         glColorTableParameteriv =               ( PFNGLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIVPROC         )wglGetProcAddress( "glColorTableParameteriv" );
00715         glCopyColorTable =                              ( PFNGLCOPYCOLORTABLEPROC                        )wglGetProcAddress( "glCopyColorTable" );
00716         glGetColorTable =                               ( PFNGLGETCOLORTABLEPROC                         )wglGetProcAddress( "glGetColorTable" );
00717         glGetColorTableParameterfv =    ( PFNGLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFVPROC      )wglGetProcAddress( "glGetColorTableParameterfv" );
00718         glGetColorTableParameteriv =    ( PFNGLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIVPROC      )wglGetProcAddress( "glGetColorTableParameteriv" );
00719         glColorSubTable =                               ( PFNGLCOLORSUBTABLEPROC                         )wglGetProcAddress( "glColorSubTable" );
00720         glCopyColorSubTable =                   ( PFNGLCOPYCOLORSUBTABLEPROC             )wglGetProcAddress( "glCopyColorSubTable" );
00721         glConvolutionFilter1D =                 ( PFNGLCONVOLUTIONFILTER1DPROC           )wglGetProcAddress( "glConvolutionFilter1D" );
00722         glConvolutionFilter2D =                 ( PFNGLCONVOLUTIONFILTER2DPROC           )wglGetProcAddress( "glConvolutionFilter2D" );
00723         glConvolutionParameterf =               ( PFNGLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFPROC         )wglGetProcAddress( "glConvolutionParameterf" );
00724         glConvolutionParameterfv =              ( PFNGLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFVPROC        )wglGetProcAddress( "glConvolutionParameterfv" );
00725         glConvolutionParameteri =               ( PFNGLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERIPROC         )wglGetProcAddress( "glConvolutionParameteri" );

00737         glGetMinmax =                                   ( PFNGLGETMINMAXPROC                             )wglGetProcAddress( "glGetMinmax" );

01161 
01162 //----------------------------------------------------------
01163 void
01164 StopGL()
01165 {
01167         SetGLGamma( _deviceGammaTable, _deviceGammaTable + 256, _deviceGammaTable + 512 );
01168         _deviceGammaSupported = false;
01169 
01170         free( ( void* )glFormattedDriverString );
01171         glFormattedDriverString = 0;
01172 }
01173 
01174 //----------------------------------------------------------
01175 EGLPROFILE
01176 GetGLProfile()
01177 {
01178         return profile;
01179 }
01180 
01181 //----------------------------------------------------------
01182 bool
01183 IsGLGammaSupported()
01184 {
01185         return _deviceGammaSupported;
01186 }
01187 
01188 //----------------------------------------------------------
01189 void
01190 SetGLGamma( float gamma )
01191 {
01192         if ( !_deviceGammaSupported )
01193                 return;
01194 
01196         unsigned short gammaTable[ 256 ];
01197         unsigned short* cur = gammaTable;
01198 
01200         int curColor = 0;
01201         float invGamma = 1.0f / gamma;
01202         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 256; ++j, ++cur )
01203         {
01205                 curColor = ( unsigned int )( 65535.0f * Pow( j / 255.0f, invGamma ) + 0.5f );
01206 
01208                 *cur = ( unsigned short )Clamp( curColor, 0, 65535 );
01209         }
01210 
01212         SetGLGamma( gammaTable, gammaTable, gammaTable );
01213 }
01214 
01215 //----------------------------------------------------------
01216 void
01217 SetGLGamma( unsigned short* red, unsigned short* green, unsigned short* blue )
01218 {
01219         if ( !_deviceGammaSupported )
01220                 return;
01221 
01222         PrintF( "Setting the gamma ramp...\n" );
01223 
01225         unsigned short gammaTable[ 768 ];
01226         unsigned short* cur = gammaTable;
01227 
01229         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 256; ++i, ++cur )
01230                 *cur = red[ i ];
01231 
01233         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 256; ++i, ++cur )
01234                 *cur = green[ i ];
01235 
01237         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 256; ++i, ++cur )
01238                 *cur = blue[ i ];
01239 
01241         HDC deviceDC = wglGetCurrentDC();
01242         BOOL ret = SetDeviceGammaRamp( deviceDC, gammaTable );
01243         if ( !ret )
01244         {
01245                 PrintF( "Gamma ramp change failed.\n" );
01246         }
01247         else
01248         {
01249                 PrintF( "Gamma ramp change succeeded.\n" );
01250         }
01251 }
01252 
01253 //----------------------------------------------------------
01254 bool
01255 IsExtSupported( const char* ext )
01256 {
01257         return ( strstr( glExtString, ext ) != 0 );
01258 }
01259 
01260 //----------------------------------------------------------
01261 void
01262 _DbgCheckGL( const char *file, long line )
01263 {
01264         static GLenum err;
01265         err = glGetError();
01266         if ( err != 0 )
01267         {
01269                 char lineBuf[ 20 ];
01270                 MemSet( lineBuf, 0, sizeof( lineBuf ) );
01271                 _ltoa_s( line, lineBuf, 20, 10 );
01272 
01274                 const GLubyte *str = gluErrorString( err );
01275                 tstring errorMsg = "OpenGL Error occured in file \"";
01276                 errorMsg += file;
01277                 errorMsg += ", line ";
01278                 errorMsg += lineBuf;
01279                 errorMsg += ": ";
01280                 errorMsg += ( str != 0 ? ( char * )str : "No OpenGL error given!" );
01281 //              MessageBox( NULL, errorMsg.c_str(), "OpenGL error...", MB_OK | MB_ICONERROR );
01282 
01284                 B_ERROR( ( const char * )errorMsg.c_str() );
01285         }
01286 }

01295         _bglBindTextureCount = 0;
01296         _bglSetUniformCount = 0;
01297         _bglBindBufferCount = 0;
01298 }
01299 #endif
